channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Death Valley
channel.desc: DS Janie Mallowan teams up with eccentric national treasure and beloved TV detective John Chapel, to solve a murder.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Bombing of Pan Am 103
channel.desc: Evidence is discovered amid the wreckage that could represent a potential breakthrough. It suggests that the Lockerbie bomb bears the accidental signature of a known terrorist organisation. This could change the course of the entire investigation. Representatives of the Scottish police head to Washington to collaborate with their FBI colleagues and share vital new evidence. Progress looks promising, but the CIA appears to be withholding crucial intelligence on a possible bombmaker.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: The best of the action from the final day of the Premier League season, presented - for the last time - by Gary Lineker.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Doctor Who: Unleashed
channel.desc: Go behind the scenes of the Time Lord's adventures.
